name: EnvironmentalHealthv0.3
description:
-How to play-
Use either WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
Use SPACEBAR to pick up

-Aim of the game-
Pick up and take the bags to the matching bins! 
Endless game, earn as many points as you can.

-Current bugs-
*Currently no scoreboard*
*When you press exit, the game freeze, acts as if the application has closed*
*End game UI won't rescale*
